verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] embracing a curious argument as it builds it case against Obama era car fuel economy rules : It says they kill people . Climate change deniers have long pushed the theory . Now Trump 's EPA is trying to use it for leverage in its intensifying confrontation with California .
